blogPost.excerpt: Are you getting enough sun? Suncheck allows you to record and archive your sunlight intake. Build healthy habits by learning how much solar energy you are getting!
blogPost.body: Are you getting enough sun? Suncheck allows you to record and archive your sunlight intake. Build healthy habits by learning how much solar energy you are getting!
blogPost.title: Suncheck - Track your sun-intake
blogPost.author: Sohee Kim

localize.description: 日光浴は足りていますか？Suncheckでは、太陽光の摂取量を記録し、アーカイブすることができます。自分がどれだけの太陽エネルギーを得ているかを知ることで、健康的な生活習慣を身につけましょう
你是否得到足够的阳光？Suncheck允许你记录和存档你的阳光摄入量。通过了解你获得多少太阳能，建立健康的生活习惯
你是否得到足夠的陽光？Suncheck允許你記錄和存檔你的陽光攝入量。通過了解你獲得多少太陽能，建立健康的生活習慣

previous.excerpt: Design Junction is a one-stop resource library for Designers and Creatives with curated list of best resources handpicked from around the web.

localize.description: Design Junction是一个为设计师和创意人提供的一站式资源库，其中包括从网络上精心挑选的最佳资源清单。
